summary_text: Description: Single cell ATAC-seq and RNA-seq in E7.5 and E13.5 mouse embryos.
Title: Single-cell chromatin accessibility and transcriptome atlas of mouse embryos
Data type: Unpaired scRNA-seq&scATAC-seq with cell type annotation
Description: Single-nucleus RNA-sequencing and Single-nucleus ATAC-sequencing to profile the mid thoracic spinal cord.
Title: Best practices for differential accessibility analysis in single-cell epigenomics

Description: Apply SHARE-seq to adult mouse brain and show a direct congruence in cell type definition by either chromatin accessibility or RNA expression and create cell-type specific regulatory maps.
Title: Integrative single-cell chromatin and transcriptome profiling uncovers cell-type specific regulatory interactions

Description: Apply SHARE-seq to adult mouse skin and show a direct congruence in cell type definition by either chromatin accessibility or RNA expression and create cell-type specific regulatory maps.
Title: Integrative single-cell chromatin and transcriptome profiling uncovers cell-type specific regulatory interactions

Description: Prostates from sham operated or castrated mice were sequenced using 10x Chromium Next GEM Single Cell Multiome ATAC + Gene Expression to test for differentially accessible chromatin regions and differential nuclear RNA expression.
Title: Cellular cartography reveals mouse prostate organization and determinants of castration resistance

Description: Prostates from sham operated or castrated mice were sequenced using 10x Chromium Next GEM Single Cell Multiome ATAC + Gene Expression to test for differentially accessible chromatin regions and differential nuclear RNA expression.
Title: Cellular cartography reveals mouse prostate organization and determinants of castration resistance

Description: Purify all types of homogeneous spermatogenic cells by combining transgenic labelling and synchronization of the cycle of the seminiferous epithelium, and subsequent single-cell RNA-sequencing and NOMe-sequencing.
Title: Single-cell RNA-seq Uncovers Dynamic Processes and Critical Regulators in Mouse Spermatogenesis
Data type: scRNA-seq, NOMe-seq with cell type annotation
Description: Single cell RNA sequencing, single cell ATAC sequencing from WT and VSX2SE Region deletion mice retina at adult stages

Description: Single cell RNA sequencing, single cell ATAC sequencing from E17.5 mouse lungs.

Description: ScATAC-seq were performed on FACS sorted GFP+ cells from the E18.5 hGFAP-GFP cortex. ScRNA-seq were performed on FACS sorted RFP+ cells from the P1 IS cortex which were electroporated of pCAG-Cre plasmid at E15.
Title: Decoding Cortical Glial Cell Development

Description: A single-cell ATAC-seq dataset of adult mouse brain cells provided by 10x Genomics and classify cells based on a scRNA-seq experiment from the same biological system
